line_1: For which they never toil'd nor swat;
line_2: Some, lucky, find a flow'ry spot,

line_1: For which they never toil'd nor swat;
line_2: They drink the sweet and eat the fat,

line_1: For which they never toil'd nor swat;
line_2: And haply, eye the barren hut,

line_1: An' ay the win't, an' ay the swat,
line_2: Till something held within the pat,
